title: South Korea Asylum Applications
description: Asylum Applications in South Korea decreased to 2341 Persons in 2021 from 6684 Persons in 2020. Asylum Applications in South Korea averaged 3188.43 Persons from 1999 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 16173 Persons in 2018 and a record low of 4 Persons in 1999. In South Korea, asylum applications refer to the total asylum applications filed in a given period. This page provides - South Korea Asylum Applications- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ministry of Justice, South Korea
